    • Method Detail

      • determineUpdates

        public static List<Log> determineUpdates(Route route,
                                         RoutingTable rt,
                                         Ledger ledger)
        Determine the updates to send to a Follower based upon how consistent their logs are. If no updates to send return an empty ArrayList of Log
        Parameters:
        route - The Route To determine index matching
        rt - The RoutingTable Object of the Node
        ledger - The Ledger Object of the Node
        Returns:
        Returns the List of Log updates to send to a follower over a HeartBeat

      • HandleHeartBeat

        public static void HandleHeartBeat(HeartBeat hb,
                                   Ledger ledger,
                                   HostInfo host_info,
                                   RoutingTable rt)
        Handle a HeartBeat Message that is received as a Follower. Multiple Cases 1) From a Follower - Responded True 2) From A Follower - Responded False 3) From another Leader - Term Handling to resolve multiple leaders
        Parameters:
        hb - The HeartBeat this method handles
        ledger - the Ledger Object of the Node
        host_info - The HostInfo Object of the Node
        rt - the RoutingTable Object of the Node
